summary: UX Polish testing completed. All 76 unit tests pass. Key UX improvements verified: removed 'All Set' screen, session-based cookies, correct button labels, and navigation consistency. TypeScript compilation issue fixed.

Code review confirms all UX polish changes implemented:
- Language selector label changed to 'Input language'
- Support button renamed to 'Copy Account Details'

- Seat counter shows X / Y seats format
- No standalone logout buttons in admin pages
- Copy Account Details formats output correctly with Email, Role, Organization, Org ID, Seats, Current page, App version, Timestamp
